subject: Your daily e-mail from the BBC
body:
Saturday, 12 May, 2007, 18:00 GMT 14:00 -04:00:Canada/Eastern














Search BBC Sport 













FOOTBALL




Southampton 1-2 Derby
Steve Howard scores twice to give Derby the advantage after the first leg of their semi-final play-off tie.



 
Inverness CT 2-1 Dunfermline
Dunfermline are relegated to Division One after two late Inverness goals end the Pars' spell in the Scottish Premier League.



 
Hearts 2-0 Hibernian
Goals from Michal Pospisil and Andrew Driver keep Hearts in the hunt for a place in Europe.








GOLF




Players' Ch'ship leaderboard
Leading scores from the second round at Sawgrass.



 
Andalucia Open leaderboard
Latest updates from the European Tour event in Marbella.



 
Mickelson maintains Sawgrass lead
Phil Mickelson fires a late eagle to lead by a stroke at the halfway stage of the Players' Championship.








MOTORSPORT




Massa snatches pole from Alonso
Ferrari's Felipe Massa takes pole from Fernando Alonso in the dying seconds of qualifying for Sunday's Spanish Grand Prix.



 
Barcelona circuit handed new deal
The Spanish Grand Prix will stay in Barcelona until 2016 after a new deal was agreed.



 
As it happened: Spanish GP qualifying
Felipe Massa takes pole for Ferrari at the Spanish Grand Prix.








FORMULA ONE

Felipe Massa takes pole for Ferrari at the Spanish Grand Prix.

ATHLETICS




Legendary running track reopens
A £19m sports complex is opened at the historic site where Roger Bannister broke the four-minute mile.



 
Glasgow begins Commonwealth bid
Glasgow's official 2014 bid document  is on its way to London to be handed over to the Games Federation.



 
Mutai takes Belfast marathon win
Kenyan John Mutai comes close to a record time in claiming victory in the 26th Deep RiverRock Belfast City Marathon on Monday.








CYCLING




Hoy fails in first kilo attempt
Chris Hoy misses out on the kilometre world record in Bolivia but will make another attempt on Sunday.



 
Liquigas snatch Giro time-trial
The Italian Liquigas team win the opening team time-trial stage of the Giro d'Italia and Enrico Gasparotto takes the pink jersey.



 
Discovery give Cummings Giro ride
English track star Steve Cummings will take the Giro d'Italia berth in the Discovery team left by Ivan Basso's exit.
